title: How to Make Chewy Candy

steps.headline: Add the sugar, syrup and water in a saucepan.Bring it to the boil.
Let it boil until the mixture turns a golden colour.
In a big saucepan mix butter and cream.
Bring this to the boil as well and then let it cool in a fridge.
Boil them until it reaches 250 degrees.
Put all the mixture into a tray and refrigerate overnight.

text: Add the sugar, syrup and water in a saucepan.Bring it to the boil.  Let it boil until the mixture turns a golden colour.  In a big saucepan mix butter and cream.  Bring this to the boil as well and then let it cool in a fridge.  Add both the mixtures together.  Boil them until it reaches 250 degrees.  Put all the mixture into a tray and refrigerate overnight.  Finished.
